dcterms:description: The nuScenes dataset consists of 1000 scenes of 20 seconds captured from a vehicle equipped with cameras, LIDARs, IMU, and GPS. It provides fully annotated HD maps and sensory data, including keyframes containing the pose in the global HD map, 3D point clouds, and images extracted at 2Hz.
dcterms:title: nuScenes
